compile.compiler comment: Which compiler(s) to use. Supported are 'intel', 'gnu', 'clang', 'cray'. Single value or list.
compile.cpp wrapper comment: If target system requires use of a wrapper around compiler (eg Archer), state that here
compile.insn set comment: OPTIONAL. Instruction set(s) to target. Refer to Makefile for supported ISAs. Defaults to 'Host'. Single value or list.
compile.base flags comment: OPTIONAL. Compile-time options to enable for each run
compile.permutable flags comment: OPTIONAL. List of lists of compile-time options. gen_job.py iterates over the cartesian product of inner lists.
compile.flux flags comment: OPTIONAL. List of compile-time options. gen_job.py iterates over their powerset.

run.data dirpath comment: Directory path to folder containing desired input files and input.dat
run.unit walltime comment: Runtime of a single multigrid cycle of this dataset on a single core. Used to estimate job scheduling walltime.
run.num threads comment: Number of OpenMP threads. Single value or list.
run.num repeats comment: Number of runs at each distinct job configuration
run.mg cycles comment: Number of multigrid cycles to perform.
run.validate result comment: Toggle whether to compare final grid state against a precomputed solution. If check fails, MG-CFD will exit with error.

setup.jobs dir comment: Directory path to folder containing created jobs.
setup.job scheduler comment: Specify job scheduler. Supported are 'slurm', 'moab', 'lsf', 'pbs'. Alternatively, set as empty string '' for local execution.
setup.batch header filepath comment: OPTIONAL. Filepath to custom batch job script header, overriding bundled headers in run-templates/*
setup.partition comment: Specify which job queue to target
setup.budget code comment: Specify which project code to use
